question: Which of the following can be an external data source for a ServiceNow application?

options.B: Data provided by a public web service (SOAP/REST)

question: Which one of the following is true for the Application Picker and Application Scope?

options.A: Global is reserved and doesn't appear in Picker
options.B: Selecting from Picker does not set Scope
options.C: Selecting an application from the Application Picker sets the Application Scope
options.D: Selecting Global sets Scope to Incident

question: Which of the following is an available feature in Studio? (Choose two.)
The Task table is an example of which of the following? (Choose two.)
Which of the following is true about deleting fields from a table?

options.A: Table records are deleted when a field is deleted
options.B: User-defined non-inherited fields can be deleted
options.C: Any field on a table can be deleted

question: Why would you build a custom app? (Choose two.)

options.C: To fulfill a specific use case on internal processes
options.D: To create a custom integration for a 3rd party system

question: What are three ServiceNow table creation methods? (Choose three.)

options.B: Upload and turn a spreadsheet into a custom table
options.D: Use the Now Experience Table Creator

question: When selecting a data type for a field that will be displayed on a form, which of the following statements is NOT correct?

options.B: Use Phone Number to automate validation
options.D: Use the Date data type to enter the date and time of day

explanation: The 'Date' data type only stores dates. Use 'Date/Time' for both.

question: Which one of the following is NOT part of the Form Designer?
Which class is NOT part of the Client side scoped APIs?
explanation: Scoped GlideRecord is a server-side API. In client scripts, it's restricted/not used in the same way.

question: When designing and creating a form what do you create to organize fields on a form?
Which one of the following is a good practice for adding instructions to a form?
Which of the following GlideRecord methods run a query against a database table? (Choose three.)
What is the GlideForm Client-side scripting object?
In a Business Rule, which one of the following returns the sys_id of the currently logged in user?
In which order are the elements of an Access Control evaluated?
Assume table exists with field1, field2, field3. (ACLs: table.None[admin, itil], table.*[admin], table.field3[itil]). What can 'itil' read?
explanation: itil has table level access. itil has field level access to field3. itil does NOT have access to field1 or field2 because of table.* restricted to admin.

question: Assume table exists with field1, field2, field3. (ACLs: table.None[admin, itil], table.field3[admin]). What can 'itil' read?
Which of the following is NOT a caller access field option?
Which method is used to retrieve Application Property values in a script?
What Module Link type is used to access an Application Properties page?
Identify the way(s) an application can respond to an Event generated by the gs.eventQueue() method.

options.C: a and d (Script Action and Email Notification)

question: When troubleshooting notifications, where do you navigate to see if an email was sent in response to an event?
What are the benefits of storing the majority of an Application's server-side script logic in a Script Include? (Choose three.)
explanation: C refers to options b, c, and d. (a is generally not the primary benefit).

question: Which of the following is NOT a Flow Designer feature?

options.A: Run a flow from a Catalog item
options.B: Call a flow from another flow or subflow
options.D: Test a flow using the 'Run as' feature

explanation: Flow Designer supports calling subflows, but the phrasing 'Call a flow from another flow' is often considered a trick or subflow specific.

question: What is the purpose of the coalesce field when importing data?

options.A: If match not found, update existing
options.B: To determine if a record matches an existing record or is a new record

question: If you create a SOAP Message what syntax indicates a variable to pass when the function is called?
Which of the following is NOT a way to install an application on a ServiceNow instance?

options.B: Select the Copy button on the application record

question: Using Custom UI test step in Automated Test Framework, which of the following is NOT a testable page component?
Why create Applications in ServiceNow? (Choose three.)

options.C: To allow full access to all tables
options.D: To extend the value of ServiceNow

explanation: A refers to options a, b, and d. Giving 'full access to all tables' (c) is not a reason/benefit.

question: Which of the following are supported variable data types in Flow Designer? (Choose three.)
Which of the following statements is true about Guided Application Creator?

options.A: Global scope turned on by default
options.B: Default access controls are automatically created
options.D: Scoped application user role is automatically created

question: What are the ways to designate data tables when using Guided Application Creator (GAC)? (Choose three.)

options.B: Create a new table on the platform
options.E: Use an existing table on the platform

question: What is the Event Registry?

options.A: A Workflow used to debug events
options.C: Method used in scripts to generate events
options.D: A table containing a record for every Event known to the system...

options.A: Used to push information from the server to the client
options.B: Does not exist on the mobile platform
options.D: Has default properties passed by client-side scripts

question: Client-side scripts manage what?

options.B: The Email field must have a valid value.
options.C: The user must not be locked out.

question: When crafting a scoped application that contains flow actions, what is the application called?

options.A: It needs workflow to manage processes.
options.C: It uses forms extensively to interact with data.

question: Once an application is ready to share, which methods of publishing are supported? (Choose three.)

options.C: The URI of the data to be accessed, queried, or modified
